dados_extraidos.titulo: Adaptive structural audit processes as shaped by emerging technologies
dados_extraidos.mecanismos_conformidade: Dual data governance frameworks between auditors and clients ensure data integrity, privacy compliance, and regulatory alignment.
dados_extraidos.lacunas_identificadas: Regulatory lag and dual data governance frameworks challenges hinder the seamless adoption of data-centric audit practices.
